About Us

 

Focus on innovation

Treeptik is an expert in Java JEE technologies and cloud-computing


 


T

Treeptik aims to become a key player in Java JEE application development and Cloud architectures. Thanks to our expertise we can allow you to design, develop and maintain Java JEE infrastructures and applications. This can be a daunting challenge in a constantly evolving market. Technology is a decisive factor in competition. We help you with designing better IT solutions by setting a real partnership.

History

 


T

reeptik was founded in 2011 by Fabien Amico and Arnaud Lambert. Both have a strong background in computing services. They have a fresh, social-oriented way to manage the company. Fabien is the left-side of the brain, he brings his high-level software engineering skills, his passion for new technologies and strong teaching skills. Arnaud brings his management experience to the company. Aware of the social issues of our economy, he devoted to introduce the human factor in our industry.

Treeptik relies on three main concepts:

  • Technical expertise
  • Teaching approaches
  • Employability

Founders

 


Arnaud Lambert is a Graduated of the ENSI Engineer School of Caen, in Opto and Microelectronics and of the IAE Management School of Caen. He spent one year as a researcher in optoelectronics for the aerospace industry. After that, he joined IBM as a business engineer for four years then he joined Web Cross Systems agency as the regional manager for the south of France. In 2003, he founded PHILAE, a computer services company. He sold his shares in 2010 to found Treeptik. He is also an instructor in business management at the IUT of Aix-en-Provence.

Fabien Amico has a diploma in software project management. He is also a Java JEE expert. Former analyst-programmer within the IT department at SNEF group, he spent several years as a design and development engineer in various computer services companies. He was also a Java JEE trainer for Pythagore, an IT training provider. In 2009, he founded ANAO, a consulting company specialized in application development with Open-Source technologies and JEE server administration. He closed it to found Treeptik in 2011. Fabien is also a substitute trainer at EPITA Computer Science School.

Treeptik is a team of experts in new technologies with strong social consciousness
— Arnaud Lambert, CEO
